title: Poster, "IBM, Resource Management Energy and Materials Conservation", 1980
signed: Imprinted in black ink, lower right edge, vertically (facing inward): Paul Rand
inscribed: Imprinted in black ink, upper half of page: RM; imprinted consecutively in black, yellow, orange, blue, and green ink, lower half of page: Resource Management:/ Energy and/ Materials Conservation/ Ridesharing/ Environment Protection; imprinted in gray ink, lower left corner, striped logo: IBM
description: On white ground, in upper half of sheet, imprinted in black,bold: RM.  On left side of R, half of green pine tree, between R and M (upper part), yellow circle (sun), and (lower part), blue steering wheel shape, and in middle of M, orange recycling symbol.  On lower half of sheet, imprinted consecutively in black, yellow, orange, blue, and green: Resource Management:/ Energy and/ Materials Conservation/ Ridesharing/ Environment Protection. Lower left corner, imprinted in gray, IBM logo.
